alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 23 at 8:08PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast North Dakota, including the following county, Stutsman. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 807 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pingree and Courtenay.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
